42 the game

Reach the meaning of life, the universe and of everything

Inspired by the boardgame The Mind you will have to place 14 random numbers from 0-42 in ascending order in the list on the left. Position 1 is the lowest and position 14 is the highest. Each number will appear one after another and you decide at which position to place it. You lose if you cannot place a number in ascending order.
